About me

My name is Krzysztof Gurniak, also known as Celebes or Kris.
I am a novice programmer and an aspiring video game developer.

I was born in 1991 and I currently live in Warsaw, Poland.
I am a 5th year computer science student at the Military University Of Technology.
I work part-time at Pentacomp, mostly fixing bugs in java.
